mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaolian_id as jiaolianId ,a.kecheng_uuid_number as kechengUuidNumber ,a.kecheng_name as kechengName ,a.kecheng_types as kechengTypes ,a.shangke_time as shangkeTime ,a.shangke_address as shangkeAddress ,a.kecheng_content as kechengContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaolian.jiaolian_uuid_number as jiaolianUuidNumber ,jiaolian.jiaolian_name as jiaolianName ,jiaolian.jiaolian_phone as jiaolianPhone ,jiaolian.jiaolian_id_number as jiaolianIdNumber ,jiaolian.jiaolian_photo as jiaolianPhoto ,jiaolian.jiaolian_email as jiaolianEmail
FROM kecheng a left JOIN jiaolian jiaolian ON a.jiaolian_id = jiaolian.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiaolian_id = #{params.jiaolianId} )
and a.kecheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengUuidNumber},'%')
and a.kecheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengName},'%')
and a.kecheng_types = #{params.kechengTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.shangke_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.shangkeTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.shangke_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.shangkeTimeEnd})
and a.shangke_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.shangkeAddress},'%')
and a.kecheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengContent},'%')
and a.jiaolian_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaolian.jiaolian_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianUuidNumber},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianName},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianPhone},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianIdNumber},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
